description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The White Charger. That cost me two hundred pounds; lost me seventy thousand pounds; drove me from society; eventually deprived me of my friends; and finally compelled me to quit the Service. By the author of the “Horse Guards” [i.e. R. Hort], etc" Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 12620.c.19." Page: 10 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1850 Publisher: J. & D. A.
